[pt-BR]Automatically Soft Close the Billing Groups of Expired Usage Intervals.
Each night the platform will check for intervals that have ended and using the grace period configuration below, automatically create billing groups and change their state to 'Soft Closed'.
[pt-BR]Automatically create and Soft Close Billing Groups for:
[pt-BR]When automatically closing intervals, block the intervals to new accounts.

[pt-BR]Automatically Run End Of Period Adapters On Soft Closed Billing Groups
Once a Billing Group has been Soft Closed, either automatically or manually, the platform will automatically start running End Of Period adapters.

[pt-BR]Run Scheduled Adapters
The platform will periodically run configured scheduled adapters. Note: If this setting is not selected, all scheduled adapters will need to be run manually.
[pt-BR]These settings control various aspects of Usage Server Maintenance.
[pt-BR]Grace periods used by UsageServerMaintenance.exe for determining when to Soft Close or Hard Close intervals automatically.
